text: ehet oba givisum kara gat mema samanayan taba namadinnangen kavurun (tamange givisumehi) kisivak obata adupaduvak nokarada, obata viruddhava kisivekutat udav nokarada sitinnoda, ovunta ovunge givisumehi ehi niyamita varaya dakva (kisima adupaduvak nokara) puranaya kara tabanu. niyata vasayenma allah bhaya bhaktikayinva priya karanneya
